title: Rip the days of simple yet unique/fun champs.
body:
Look at all the newly released/reworked champs with all their uncessarly complicated and complex and overloaded kits.

I mean seriously, look at the size of GP's powder keg tooltip, that thing has more words and mechanics than certain champs whole kits, and gp was a simple champion.

Fuck ''#LCSbigplays'' ruining the game.
